code: const API_URL='http://localhost:5065/api';export const login=async adIdentifier=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/auth/login`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({adIdentifier})});if(!response.ok){const error=await response.json();throw new Error(error.message||'Failed to login');}return response.json();};
